name: Doomn't
description:
A doom/wolfenstein clone made for a class project. Go through 3 levels up to the final boss to complete the game. You'll unlock new weapons and find new enemies along your gameplay.

Controls:

- WASD : Move

- Space : Dash

- Left Click : Shoot

- 1 / 2 / 3 : Change guns

Created by: Sara Moreno, Bryan Armijos, Oriol Muñoz and Álvaro Ramírez
